text: In general, no due to the nature of consensus; also nodejs is asynch, you might want to look into the promise package
<@U11CP8FF1>: you can make your code appear synchronous using promises

Thanks. I'll take a look at promise package.  I wonder what the typical architecture to check if the transaction has succeeded or not. May be this is a question in <#C13TAJN9Z> channel. I'll take a look at the channel too.
